mapper.update: update real_time_data set vehicle_id = #{vehicleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, engine_speed = #{engineSpeed,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, fuel_margin = #{fuelMargin,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, engine_temperature = #{engineTemperature,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, speed = #{speed,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, running_state = #{runningState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, locked_state = #{lockedState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Inclination = #{inclination,jdbcType=INTEGER} where real_time_id = #{realTimeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select real_time_id, vehicle_id, engine_speed, fuel_margin, engine_temperature, speed, running_state, locked_state, Inclination from real_time_data where real_time_id = #{realTimeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select real_time_id, vehicle_id, engine_speed, fuel_margin, engine_temperature, speed, running_state, locked_state, Inclination from real_time_data
